Articles.Content:
I'm not really sure if this should go in here or not, but I have a problem with my career after updating to 1.0.5.

 

So some of the parts in career got moved and now appear to be duplicated. The game tells me I can't launch vessels because of locked parts. Except I have no idea how to delete the dupes.

 

Or maybe I should simply download some custom tech tree...

Edited December 15, 2015 by Veeltch
Can you give an example?  As far as I can tell, nothing got duplicated.  If you're seeing dupes, my guess would be that there's some mod somewhere that's out of sync.

3 hours ago, Veeltch said:

I'm not really sure if this should go in here or not, but I have a problem with my career after updating to 1.0.5.

 

So some of the parts in career got moved and now appear to be duplicated. The game tells me I can't launch vessels because of locked parts. Except I have no idea how to delete the dupes.

 

Or maybe I should simply download some custom tech tree...

If this is a pre-existing save game and you are talking about duplicates in the tech-tree then it requires editing your save file.

To do so, find the SCENARIO node named ResearchAndDevelopment. Inside that are Tech nodes with id = Start, id = basicRocketry, etc. Those Tech nodes cannot have duplicate parts. If you're not sure which ones are the duplicates then delete the duplicated part in every Tech node it appears in. (you'll probably need to go in after and purchase that part in the R&D building)

9 hours ago, Snark said:

Can you give an example?  As far as I can tell, nothing got duplicated.  If you're seeing dupes, my guess would be that there's some mod somewhere that's out of sync.

http://m.imgur.com/a/NaWBq

 

Look at the Whiplash. It's in two different nodes. One node is unlocked, the other one locked.
